title: Kasshoku Henshuu-san to Shota Mangaka
original_name: 褐色編集さんとショタ漫画家
sinopse:
Nagi Miyazaki hasn't been able to showcase his talent as a mangaka. On top of that, his editor recently changed. After returning home one day, Nagi, depressed, opened his door to find... a beautiful, dark brown woman in her underwear?!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
